signature: static IllegalArgumentException format(final Throwable t, final String format, final Object... args)
name: format
javadoc:
/**
 * Formats an exception message using a specified format string and arguments,
 * then wraps it in an {@link IllegalArgumentException}.
 *
 * @param t the underlying cause of the exception
 * @param format the format string to use for the exception message
 * @param args the arguments to be used in the formatted exception message
 * @return a new {@link IllegalArgumentException} with the formatted message and cause
 */
